fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load SVN log from file (offline version)
To use the offline version of plugin you need to generate SVN log in a xml format using the following command:
svn log --xml --verbose --use-merge-history repo_url > result.xml
Result of this command should be saved in file on your disk and this file's path needs to be given in "Selected file" field in configuration dialog.
Please check workflow examples here or inside plugin jar.

fullDescription.option: File with SVN log to analyze in offline version of plugin

It gives a possibility to filter files. Empty box or * means that files with any extension will be displayed. There could be typed more than one extension, to do so, extensions should be splitted by coma.
Prefix of package. It is only used with java files. Empty box lets displaying files with any package prefix.

ports.outPort: Table with data read from SVN log file
